metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22218 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in function _libssh2_packet_add in libssh2 1.10.0 allows attackers to access out of bounds memory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.8.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-1ubuntu0.1').
